name: Otto (itch) (Fiddlebog)
description:
Cast down from the laboratories above, our hero Otto must climb back up to the surface! Along the way you will face many foes, acquire useful upgrades, and wreak vengeance on those who discarded you. There are 15 scientists hiding throughout the underground tunnels - can you find them all and pay them back for what they did?

===================================

CONTROLS

[A] and [D] - Move left and right

[S] - Fall through platforms

[E] - Interact/Talk

[Space] - Jump (and Fire Cannons when unlocked)

[Arrow Keys] - Midair Attack (when unlocked)

===================================

This game was made in one month for the Metroidvania Month 14 Game Jam with the restriction that the game had to fall under the Metroidvania genre. The jam also had an optional theme of "Monochromatic" which I also chose to follow.

This was a solo effort and all graphics and code were made during the game jam's time period. I acquired the music from https://freemusicarchive.org, which is where I found the main music:  Acid Planet by Alien Operator and the boss music: Tempered Glass by Ritzke. All sound effects were from the Halftone SFX Pack.
